00054         class sObject
00055         {
00056                 public:
00057                 sObject(sVertex *_v, ids _id)
00058                 {
00059                         v = _v;
00060                         id = _id;
00061                 };
00062                 sVertex *v;
00063                 ids id;
00064         };
00065         
00066         class sObjectCompare
00067         {
00068                 public:
00069                 bool greater(sObject *v1, sObject *v2, int dim)
00070                 {
00071                         MF_ASSERT((dim == 0)||(dim == 1));
00072                         return v1->v->getCoord(dim) > v2->v->getCoord(dim);
00073                 };
00074         };
00075 
00076         mfKdTree<sObject*,sObjectCompare> *kd;  
00078 private:

00105 template <class _Traits> mfDelaunay2D<_Traits>::mfDelaunay2D(int block_size, bool kdtree)
00106 :search(NULL)
00107 {
00108         free = true;
00109         mesh = new sMesh(block_size);
00110         geom.setMesh(mesh);
00111         top.setMesh(mesh);
00112         
00113         if(kdtree)
00114                 kd = new mfKdTree<sObject*,sObjectCompare>(2);
00115         else
00116                 kd = NULL;
00117                 
00118         search.setMesh(mesh);
00119 }

00167 template <class _Traits> mfDelaunay2D<_Traits>::~mfDelaunay2D()
00168 {
00169         if(kd)
00170                 delete kd;
00171         
00172         if(free)
00173                 delete mesh;

00175 
00176 template <class _Traits> IDS mfDelaunay2D<_Traits>::searchVertex(space *coords)
00177 {
00178         sVertex v;
00179         v.setCoords(coords);
00180         
00181         MF_ASSERT(kd);
00182         
00183         sObject o(&v,-1);
00184         sObject *near;
00185         
00186         near = kd->nearest(&o);
00187         
00188         if((near)&&(geom.sameVertices(&v,near->v)))
00189                 return near->id;
00190         else
00191                 return -1;
00192                 
00193 }
00194 
00195 template <class _Traits> void mfDelaunay2D<_Traits>::add(ids idvertice, ids inicell MF_DMUTEXV)
00196 {
00197         MF_ASSERT(idvertice >=0);
00198         
00199         int edge = -1, pos;
00200         
00201         if(kd)
00202         {
00203                 sObject *novo = new sObject(mesh->getVertex(idvertice),idvertice);
00204                 
00205                 if(inicell < 0)
00206                 {
00207                         sObject *o = kd->nearestAndInsert(novo);
00208                         if(o)
00209                                 inicell = o->v->getSingCell();
00210                 }
00211                 else
00212                         kd->insert(novo);
00213         }               
00214 
00215 //      pos = searchInMesh(idvertice, inicell, edge MF_MUTEXV);
00216         pos = search.dido(mesh->getVertex(mesh->getCell(inicell)->getVertexId(0)),mesh->getVertex(idvertice)->getCoords(), inicell, edge MF_MUTEXV);
00217         
00218         MF_ASSERT(pos != 3); // vertice repetido
00219         
00220         if( pos == 0 )
00221                 insertIn(inicell,idvertice MF_MUTEXV);
00222         else if( pos == 1 )
00223                 insertOut(inicell,idvertice,edge MF_MUTEXV);
00224         else if( pos == 2)
00225                 insertOn(inicell,idvertice,edge MF_MUTEXV);
00226 }
00227 
00228 template <class _Traits> IDS mfDelaunay2D<_Traits>::addVertex(space *coords, ids inicell MF_DMUTEXV)
00229 {
00230         ids idvertice = searchVertex(coords);
00231         if( idvertice < 0 )
00232         {
00233                 idvertice = mesh->addVertex(coords MF_MUTEXV);
00234                 
00235                 if( mesh->getNumberOfVertices(MF_MUTEX) > 3)
00236                         add(idvertice,inicell MF_MUTEXV);
00237                 else 
00238                 {
00239                         sObject *novo = new sObject(mesh->getVertex(idvertice),idvertice);
00240                                         
00241                         if(kd)
00242                                 kd->insert(novo);
00243                         
00244                         if( mesh->getNumberOfVertices(MF_MUTEX) == 3)
00245                         {
00246                                 ids newcell[3];
00247                                 
00248                                 mfVerticesIterator<_Traits> it(mesh);
00249                                 it.initialize();
00250                                 
00251                                 newcell[0] = &it;
00252                                 ++it;
00253                                 newcell[1] = &it;
00254                                 ++it;
00255                                 newcell[2] = &it;
00256         
00257                                 mesh->addCell(newcell MF_MUTEXV);
00258                         }
00259                 }
00260         }
00261         
00262         return idvertice;
00263 }

00265 template <class _Traits> SMESH* mfDelaunay2D<_Traits>::getMesh(MF_DMUTEX)
00266 {
00267         return mesh;
00268 }

00434 template <class _Traits> void mfDelaunay2D<_Traits>::legalizeEdge(ids idcelula, int edge MF_DMUTEXV)
00435 {
00436         sCell *celula = mesh->getCell(idcelula MF_MUTEXV);
00437         
00438         if ( celula->getMateId(edge MF_MUTEXV) >= 0)
00439         {
00440                 
00441                 ids idoposta = celula->getMateId(edge MF_MUTEXV);
00442                 sCell *oposta = mesh->getCell(idoposta MF_MUTEXV);
00443                 
00444 #ifdef MF_THREADS
00445                 if(mutex) lockCells(idcelula, idoposta, celula, oposta);
00446 #endif
00447                 
00448                 ids idv = celula->getVertexId(edge MF_MUTEXFALSEV);
00449 
00450                 MF_ASSERT(oposta->getVertexMateId(idcelula MF_MUTEXFALSEV) >= 0); // troquei: getMateVertexId
00451 
00452                 if(geom.inCircle(mesh->getVertex(celula->getVertexId((edge+2)%3)),
00453                                                  mesh->getVertex(celula->getVertexId(edge)),
00454                                                  mesh->getVertex(celula->getVertexId((edge+1)%3)),
00455                                                  mesh->getVertex(oposta->getVertexMateId(idcelula MF_MUTEXFALSEV) MF_MUTEXV) MF_MUTEXFALSEV))//troquei: getMateVertexId
00456                 {
00457                         top.flip2D(idcelula, idoposta MF_MUTEXFALSEV);
00458 
00459                         MF_ASSERT(oposta->getVertexId(0 MF_MUTEXFALSEV) != oposta->getVertexId(1 MF_MUTEXFALSEV));
00460                         MF_ASSERT(oposta->getVertexId(2 MF_MUTEXFALSEV) != oposta->getVertexId(1 MF_MUTEXFALSEV));
00461                         MF_ASSERT(oposta->getVertexId(0 MF_MUTEXFALSEV) != oposta->getVertexId(2 MF_MUTEXFALSEV));
00462 
00463                         MF_ASSERT(celula->getVertexId(0 MF_MUTEXFALSEV) != celula->getVertexId(1 MF_MUTEXFALSEV));
00464                         MF_ASSERT(celula->getVertexId(2 MF_MUTEXFALSEV) != celula->getVertexId(1 MF_MUTEXFALSEV));
00465                         MF_ASSERT(celula->getVertexId(0 MF_MUTEXFALSEV) != celula->getVertexId(2 MF_MUTEXFALSEV));
00466 
00467 #ifdef MF_THREADS
00468                         if(mutex) lockCells(idcelula, idoposta, celula, oposta);
00469 #endif
00470                         legalizeEdge(idcelula,celula->getVertexIndex(idv MF_MUTEXV) MF_MUTEXV);
00471                         legalizeEdge(idoposta,oposta->getVertexIndex(idv MF_MUTEXV) MF_MUTEXV);
00472                 }
00473 #ifdef MF_THREADS
00474                 else if(mutex) lockCells(idcelula, idoposta, celula, oposta);
00475 #endif
00476                         
00477         }
00478 }
00479 
00480 #ifdef MF_THREADS
00481 template <class _Traits> void mfDelaunay2D<_Traits>::lockCells(ids id1, ids id2, sCell *c1, sCell *c2)
00482 {
00483         if(id1 < id2)
00484         {
00485                 c1->lock();
00486                 c2->lock();
00487         }
00488         else
00489         {
00490                 c2->lock();
00491                 c1->lock();
00492         }               
00493 }
00494 #endif

00544 
00545 template <class _Traits> void mfDelaunay2D<_Traits>::insertIn(ids idcelula, ids idvertice MF_DMUTEXV)
00546 {
00547         sCell *c = mesh->getCell(idcelula MF_MUTEXV);
00548         
00549         ids vids[3] = { c->getVertexId(0 MF_MUTEXV), c->getVertexId(1 MF_MUTEXV), c->getVertexId(2 MF_MUTEXV)};
00550 
00551         ids newcell[3], cellsids[3];
00552         
00553         mesh->delCell(idcelula MF_MUTEXV);
00554         
00555         newcell[0] = idvertice;
00556         newcell[1] = vids[0];                   
00557         newcell[2] = vids[1];
00558         cellsids[0] = mesh->addCell(newcell MF_MUTEXV);
00559         
00560         newcell[0] = idvertice;
00561         newcell[1] = vids[1];
00562         newcell[2] = vids[2];
00563         cellsids[1] = mesh->addCell(newcell MF_MUTEXV);
00564         
00565         newcell[0] = idvertice;
00566         newcell[1] = vids[2];
00567         newcell[2] = vids[0];
00568         cellsids[2] = mesh->addCell(newcell MF_MUTEXV);
00569         
00570         legalizeEdge(cellsids[0],mesh->getCell(cellsids[0] MF_MUTEXV)->getVertexIndex(idvertice MF_MUTEXV) MF_MUTEXV);
00571         legalizeEdge(cellsids[1],mesh->getCell(cellsids[1] MF_MUTEXV)->getVertexIndex(idvertice MF_MUTEXV) MF_MUTEXV);
00572         legalizeEdge(cellsids[2],mesh->getCell(cellsids[2] MF_MUTEXV)->getVertexIndex(idvertice MF_MUTEXV) MF_MUTEXV);
00573 }
00574 
00575 template <class _Traits> void mfDelaunay2D<_Traits>::insertOut(ids c, ids v, int edge  MF_DMUTEXV)
00576 {
00577         mfBoundaryCellCIterator2D<_Traits> ibc(mesh);
00578         sVertex *vs[3];
00579                 
00580         vs[2] = mesh->getVertex(v MF_MUTEXV);
00581         
00582         ibc.initialize(c,edge);
00583         
00584         vs[0] = mesh->getVertex(ibc->getVertexId((ibc.getEdge()+2)%3));
00585         vs[1] = mesh->getVertex(ibc->getVertexId((ibc.getEdge()+1)%3));
00586         
00587         while(geom.inLeft(vs[0], vs[1], vs[2]) == 1)
00588         {
00589                 ++ibc;
00590                 vs[0] = mesh->getVertex(ibc->getVertexId((ibc.getEdge()+2)%3));
00591                 vs[1] = mesh->getVertex(ibc->getVertexId((ibc.getEdge()+1)%3));
00592         }
00593         
00594 //      ids tempc;
00595         int tempe, i;
00596         mfList<ids> lista, listaw;
00597         
00598         do
00599         {
00600                 --ibc;
00601                 tempe = (ibc.getEdge()+1)%3;
00602 //              if(geom.inCircle(*ibc, vs[2]) > 0)

00641 template <class _Traits> void mfDelaunay2D<_Traits>::insertOn(ids c, ids idvertice, int edge  MF_DMUTEXV)
00642 {
00643         ids coposto;
00644         
00645         sCell *cell = mesh->getCell(c MF_MUTEXV), *cellop;
00646         
00647         
00648         coposto = cell->getMateId(edge MF_MUTEXV);
00649         
00650 
00651         if(coposto >= 0)
00652         {                       
00653                 cellop = mesh->getCell(coposto MF_MUTEXV);
00654                 
00655 
00656                 ids vids[4];
00657

00660                 vids[2] = cellop->getVertexMateId(c MF_MUTEXV);
00661                 vids[3] = cell->getVertexId((edge+2)%3 MF_MUTEXV);
00662

00664                 
00665                 mesh->delCell(c MF_MUTEXV);
00666                 mesh->delCell(coposto MF_MUTEXV);

00687

00689                 legalizeEdge(cellsids[1],mesh->getCell(cellsids[1] MF_MUTEXV)->getVertexIndex(idvertice MF_MUTEXV) MF_MUTEXV);
